errCheck module¶

errCheck.correctName(fileName)¶

str -> bool A function that checks, whether filename is true. >>> correctName(“me.csv”) True >>> correctName(“mec.sv”) False

errCheck.mainCheck(fileName)¶

str -> str str -> bool A function that checks all errors that may happen in a file. >>> mainCheck(“main.cdf”) “Invalid file name” >>> mainCheck(“main.csv”) False
